description.value: Marked by Biomareâ€™s experimental endeavors, you stand as a living testament to Rubi-Ka's relentless pursuit of biotechnological advancement. The experiments left a mark on you, yet they left unanswered questions about your own humanity. Now, you venture out, seeking to define your place in a world where science blurs the line between the possible and the ethical.

ideals.description: "Someone saw the real me beyond the mutations."
"I sought to understand the purpose behind my alterations."
"I expressed my heritage, background, or beliefs through my actions."

life_path.name: Genetic Enhancements
life_path.description: Subjected to genetic modification experiments, you've developed heightened abilities, but at the cost of constant physical and mental adjustments.

life_path.name: Chemical Resilience
life_path.description: After exposure to numerous experimental compounds, your body has developed an unusual resilience to toxins and diseases.

life_path.name: Neurological Experiments
life_path.description: Neural enhancements have granted you heightened senses and perception, but with lingering side effects that challenge your mental fortitude.

life_path.name: Physical Conditioning Trials
life_path.description: Through rigorous physical trials, your body has been conditioned to extraordinary levels, enduring stresses beyond normal human limits.

life_path.name: Mental Fortitude
life_path.description: Psychological experimentation has sharpened your mental resilience and cognitive abilities, though at times you struggle with maintaining mental balance.

life_path.name: Adaptive Survivor
life_path.description: Having survived a multitude of Biomare's tests, you've become a master at adapting to any physical or mental challenge thrown your way.
